remarks: Express the predicate " ` J ` is a topology," using "the intersection of the elements of any finite subcollection" instead of the intersection of any two elements.  (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2006.)
statement:
istop2g $p |- ( J e. A -> ( J e. Top <-> ( A. x ( x C_ J -> U. x e. J ) /\ A. x ( ( x C_ J /\ x =/= (/) /\ x e. Fin ) -> |^| x e. J ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d J x $.
